Package au.csiro.pathling.terminology.caching

Class PersistentCachingTerminologyService

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.utilities.ResourceCloser
au.csiro.pathling.terminology.BaseTerminologyService
au.csiro.pathling.terminology.caching.CachingTerminologyService
au.csiro.pathling.terminology.caching.PersistentCachingTerminologyService
All Implemented Interfaces:
TerminologyService, Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class PersistentCachingTerminologyService extends CachingTerminologyService
A terminology service that uses embedded Infinispan to cache results on disk. Requires configuration that includes a storage location, which is where cache data and indexes will be stored.
Author:
John Grimes
